text: Today we're detaching the grass. Over time, layers of grass get built up and it forms a mat. Remove this mat and help improve the health of the grass. Try a regular rake. I've rented a power rake. We turned the rental, but I didn't rake it up yet. Look at this. This was all matted in there. And there's still plenty left. Gotta get this raked up. All that's left is this little stuff. It's so much cleaner now. But all I'm gonna do now is just fertilize it.
